name: Hunor And Magor
description:
The game will be vaguely based of the hungarian origin legend "Csodaszarvas legendája"  or just Hunor and Magor. This game will be a local co-op game with a bit of adventure and puzzle solving and action.

***0.0.2 Version is just the early concepts and art, nothing special for now***

Player one/Single Player controls:

WASD - moving
Space - Attack
E - Interact

Player Two:

Arrows - moving
Enter - Attack
Rightshift - Interact

Change player F2

***This is just a prototype! if you have any feedback or idea please leave a comment, thank you!***
